Generation IX.Scarlet: The chain is made from toxins that enhance capabilities. It stimulated Munkidori's brain and caused the Pokémon's psychic powers to bloom.
Generation IX.Violet: Munkidori keeps itself somewhere safe while it toys with its foes, using psychokinesis to induce intense dizziness.

Generation IX.The Hidden Treasure of Area Zero: Wistful Fields (after completing the main story of The Teal Mask ; only one )
